Counter Strike is basically the birth of modern, realistic, team shooters. It's the beginning of the biggest shooter series in the world. I never got into any of the CS games but I know they're good and I got them all from the Valve Complete Pack. I gave it a try and it's not bad, I just can't enjoy the dated graphics, bad UI, and weak playerbase. Still a good game but I won't be playing it in the future.
